title: HARAKIRI FOR THE SKY Streams New Single "With Autumn I'll Surrender", Announces New Album
description: Right in time for the cold weather.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
excerpt: Right in time for the cold weather.
text: Harakiri For The Sky have arrived with new music just in time for the colder weather to set in. Harakiri For The Sky is now streaming "With Autumn I'll Surrender" from their upcoming record Scorched Earth, due out January 24 through AOP Records. As you'd expect from Harakiri For The Sky at this point, the new track is eight minutes of driving, miserable, blackened melodic post-rock. "With 'With Autumn I'll Surrender' we're finally releasing the first single of our upcoming album Scorched Earth," wrote Harakiri For The Sky of the single. "For this purpose, we chose a song that combines the HFTS typical Post Black Metal energy with riffs that hail from the glorious times of the Grunge and Indie Rock era. A first hint where this album and its songs are leading us…" Scorched Earth features cover artwork by Brvno Gonzalez. Harakiri For The Sky will also hit the road next February with headliners Swallow The Sun and fellow support bands Ghost Bath, and Snakes Of Russia.
